column8: Arthur C. Clarke once declared that, "Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic." This one goes out to all our data wizards with a gift for viz! This collection is a treasure trove of magical items that form a complete wizarding outfit, symbolic of the expertise and mastery of a Data VIZard.

column2: Achieve Top 10 Teams in Data VIZard
Achieve Top 5 Teams in Data VIZard

column8: "Data is the new gold," as Mark Cuban famously quipped, and this rings true for our hardworking DATx teams who are constantly data mining for insights. Every ImpactiVIZ team engages in essential data mining practices to uncover meaningful and actionable information for their agencies. To honor this effort, we've put together a collection of miner-themed items that form a complete set of shiny miner wear.

column2: Achieve Top 5 Teams in ImpactiVIZ (Agency Internal Judging)​

column8: Ground control to Major Dev! Like David Bowie's iconic song, the Launchpad collection takes a dive into deep space by gearing you up with everything you need from ground control. This collection culminates in a bid for the coveted centrepiece - Buzz Lightyear wings!
